/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the highway, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The highway itself is divided by a concrete barrier, providing a sense of safety and order. On either side of the highway, there are trees and buildings, adding a touch of urban life to the scene. A billboard stands on the right side of the highway, perhaps advertising a product or service. The image is taken from a low angle, looking down the highway, which adds a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the green of the trees and the gray of the highway and buildings. The image is a snapshot of a typical day on a highway in Beijing, capturing the city's blend of natural beauty and urban development.
